items.sentence: I was very impressed by the way Tom did that.
I want Tom and Mary working together on this.
I want Tom and Mary to work on this together.
I promised I'd attend Tom and Mary's wedding.
I hear Boston is very cold this time of year.
I had a party last week, but Tom didn't come.
Don't Tom and Mary often play chess together?
Does Tom still want to go to the zoo with us?
Does Tom still think that's going to be easy?
Does Tom still think that's all he has to do?
Does Tom still go to the same school as Mary?
Do Tom and Mary like the same kind of movies?
Tom scribbled on the wall with a blue crayon.
Tom peeked in the box to see what was inside.
Tom looked in the box to see what was inside.
Tom is one of the meanest guys I've ever met.
Tom has been a friend of mine for many years.
I've already given Tom permission to do that.
Tom didn't seem to have anything else to say.
Tom is always asking me to do things for him.
